name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
summary: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows is a 2013 downloadable video game developed by Red Fly Studio and published by Activision based on the ongoing Nickelodeon animated television series of the same name. The game was released on August 28, 2013 for Xbox Live Arcade and Steam. The game features a four-player online mode and offline two-player co-op
info:
